answers.text:
Hi Greg, 
Unfortunately we do not have many resources on this topic. However this previously asked question contains some links that you may find useful for your project. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21777
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I'm working on a project for a member on metrics for prosecution costs.  I’m looking to see if there are any local governments that use contract prosecutors.  If you do use contract prospectors, please fill out this short survey to help answer a couple questions: 
https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/DQQH9S8 
Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: Prosecution Costs Metrics
